attributes.action: put fully qualified policeman back on the beat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By cutting the paperwork that keeps police tied to their desks,by having civilians filling in the paperwork instead; such as they do in the USA; we can return them to the streets of the UK. Any presence they have now is not enough. By ensuring that there is a consistent presence, we believe would lower crime levels, and possibly detour anti social behaviour, for the following reasons, first by keeping these offenders in check. Having a police presence really adds a good deal to the community spirit as it provides the public with the chance to communicate with someone in a position of responsibility directly, rather than going through bureacratic channels which can be daunting to some people.Remember these bobbies would acquire a lot of local knowledege; which would assist them in their work a great deal.So lets bring our bobbies back!
